name: Shonta
title: Trimmer/Processor
coverLetter: I am a very passionate person when it comes to promotiing and advocating for cannibus. I have been in the industry for over ten years now and love every minute of it. I have worked on indoor and outdoor flower and know about quality product. I am a team player and a hard worker, very dependable and reliable. I look forward to growing within a company and learning more about cannibus.
experience:
> Trimming outdoor in Bay Area for over six years.


>Trimming indoor in the Bay Area for over five years


>Budtender for one year


> Sales for less than a year
additionalInfo: > I have also worked and slepted on outdoor farms for over two years.
